I tried all the following but the results remained stochastic:

torch.manual_seed(12)
torch.cuda.manual_seed(12)
np.random.seed(12)
random.seed(12)

torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic=True

The only thing that worked was also setting num_workers=0 in the DataLoader constructor. I am using PyTorch 0.5 built from source.

body:
I tried all the following but the results remained stochastic: 
```
torch.manual_seed(12)
torch.cuda.manual_seed(12)
np.random.seed(12)
random.seed(12)

torch.backends.cudnn.deterministic=True
```

The only thing that worked was also setting num_workers=0 in the DataLoader constructor. I am using PyTorch 0.5 built from source.
